title: Katya Jones falls again on Strictly: It Takes Two as she pokes fun at two tumbles
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katya poked fun again at her falls on Strictly Come Dancing on Saturday by falling for the third time.

She performed another comedy fall as she entered the studio on It Takes Two with Rylan Clark-Neal, while a hilarious crashing sound effect played.

She then rewatched the moment as it was entered in the Strictly Fall of Shame, where the best falls on the show are celebrated.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Laughing, she noted how she grabbed on to partner Mike Bushell's tie to try to stop herself from falling.

She then told Mike to carry on as she turned the fall into an elegant floor skid.

Katya was accused of being intoxicated following her second, highly dramatic fall shortly after the first.

(Image: BBC)

But she insisted the second fall was deliberate and intended to poke fun at herself.

She reiterated to Rylan: "I was not drunk!"

Rylan revealed that in next week's show Katya and Mike will be dancing the quick step to Come On Eileen.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

The delighted pair said they hope to get audience's dancing and said they were having loads of fun already rehearsing for their performance on Saturday.

Later on, Emma Weymouth and Aljaz Skorjanec laughed at the way Aljaz held his partners ears during their dance.

He jokingly blamed the tender touch on the fact that the drums were very loud during the show and he wanted to protect her ears.

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

Emma revealed she has been cooking for her dance partner, and she warned Rylan "if he puts on weight it's because of me!"

Aljaz also told viewers they were involving a wall in Saturday's dance.

"We will be doing wall-ography!" he revealed.
description: Katya once again performed a comedy fall - but this time there was no question it was real
